subtasks.description: Fix dashboard database connection and ensure / endpoint works
Ensure data explorer at /explorer is fully functional
Fix chat API endpoint and ensure /chat interface works
Enable all necessary API endpoints in main.py

completion_criteria: Dashboard at / loads without database errors
Data explorer at /explorer is fully functional
Chat interface at /chat works with API endpoint
All core API endpoints are enabled and working
Health endpoint confirms system is healthy

real_world_testing.notes: All 4 core components tested and working: dashboard with database connection, data explorer with API endpoints, chat interface with API integration, all necessary API endpoints enabled

agent_handoff.handoff_notes: Deploy and fix the 4 core components: dashboard, data explorer, chat, and API endpoints
